        public static double max(double[] values)
        Analog of Math.max that returns the largest double value in an array of doubles.
        Parameters:
        values - the values to be searched for the largest value among them
        Returns:
        the largest value among a set of given values

        Parameters:
        values - the values to be searched for the smallest value among them
        Returns:
        the smallest value among a set of given values
